name: Warmog's Armor
simpleDescription: Grants massive Health and Health Regen

passives.effects: Grants Warmog's Heart if you have at least 2000 bonus health.

passives.name: Warmog's Heart
passives.effects: Health regeneration|Regenerate1.5s% maximum health every 0.5s seconds (15% maximum health every 5 seconds)if damage has not been taken in the last 8 seconds (4 seconds for damage from non-champions).

passives.name: Warmog's Vitality
passives.effects: Gain bonus health equal to 12% bonus health from items.
